title.narrative: Emergency Water, Hygiene and Sanitation services to Vulnerable Community in Wau

description.narrative: The project will support Internally displaced people (IDPs) within the Protection of Civilians (PoCs) and other IDP locations through the provision of access to clean water for drinking and other domestic use; and will promote community hygiene through awareness, provision of sanitation facilities and services.
